actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Governmental Efficiency.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from Government of the District of Columbia; Office of Personnel Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Governmental Efficiency and the District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to authorize the set-off of annuity payments and refunds payable from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund to former employees of the government of the District of Columbia in order to liquidate debts owed to the government of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Office of Personnel Management to set off funds payable to a former District of Columbia employee from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund against debts owed to the District of Columbia government.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the set-off of annuity payments and refunds payable from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund to former employees of the government of the District of Columbia in order to liquidate debts owed to the government of the District of Columbia.
